name: Pirate Bingo
description:
The Nordic Pirates are searching for the Lost Treasure! The first pirate who gets three treasures in a row in their map wins! But beware! Get too close to the other pirate and he will steal your valuable treasures!

Red Pirate moves with WASD

Blue Pirate moves with ARROWS

The game looks better on its excecutable version. But its completely playable on its web version.
